WELCOME_MESSAGE: Welcome to the ANY.RUN Sandbox API for Telegram! Please use the menu below or type a command.
HELP_MESSAGE:
Here are the main options:

• Profile: View and manage your profile
• Settings: Adjust bot settings
• Help: Show this help message
• Language: Change the bot language

You can also use these commands:
/start - Show the main menu
/menu - Show the main menu
/help - Show this help message
/language - Update the bot's language
LANGUAGE_UPDATE_ERROR: An error occurred while updating the language. Please try again later.
MAIN_MENU_TEXT: Main Menu - Please select an option:
PROFILE_INFO: Here you can view and manage your profile information.
SETTINGS_INFO: Here you can adjust various bot settings.
UNKNOWN_OPTION: Sorry, I don't recognize that option. Please try again.
